sentences.sentence: This principle can be extended to other angularity error evaluation.

sentences.sentence: Time dissipates to shining ether the solid angularity of facts Ralph Waldo Emerson.

sentences.sentence: There is little study on the influence of coarse aggregates angularity on hot-mix asphalt properties.
